content.text:
This page is about a cms using latest theniques like ajax, json, jquery... to build a simple javascript based cms. Saving data as json to a file for each site. the simplest way to use in templates

  • lightweight ~3mb
  • simple to use
  • more functionality
  • integrated newsletter system
  • intelligent chaching, mio of page requests are no problem on hardly any webspace
  • full javascript based with a bit of php magic for the api's
